title: We need PANTS!

replies.body:
Codpiece of Noxus:
50 armour
500 health
-10% movespeed
50%  damage reduction from critical strikes
Turns out critical strikes are actually just kicks to the groin
Crit Sion. Let's not get into Camille.
Does {{champion:6}} have a groin?
He has three of them actually {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
I can see Rule 34 working wonders here!
Codpiece of Demacia, its component item.

> [{quoted}](name=TequilaZombie,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=fgEms6j3,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-12-19T11:14:15.900+0000)
> Or some weird stuff that nobody really knows what they are or why you would bring it to a fight:
>{{item:3401}} {{item:3110}} {{item:3024}} 
> 


WHY WOULD YOU BRING A SHIELD INTO BATTLE
I always figured frozen heart was... heart sized. More the gems category
Frozen Heart is a shield?? I thought it was just like an orb that made people slower.
{{item:1082}} **** ring is the only under-the-belt protection i see
We got {{item:1011}} but no trousers to keep up.

And thus the source of Camile's true damage was uncovered.

{{champion:78}} Lol, EZ lane, I counter you. {{item:3068}} {{item:3047}} {{item:3025}}  {{item:3065}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3026}} 
{{champion:164}} Haha, shin kick!
{{champion:78}} Ow! WTF!

**Pants Are Dragon**
10 Armor
10 Magic Resist
Unique Passive: Every death rewards you with 400 gold.
Unique active: is wrong about the effects of nerfs or buffs in the next patch
I don't miss pants. Too busy firing my swords at enemies from my bow.
Have no fear, AngusBoomPants is here

Doran's Shorts: 550 Gold
+50 Health
+5 Armour

UNIQUE Passive: Steelback - You cannot be slowed with attacks/spells from behind if you under level 8.
Why not take off the 5 armor so it can be a starting item?

{{champion:69}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:136}} {{champion:56}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:101}} 

Would like a word
Xerath has legs.
you can see them in his dance

That feel when you're so legless the item vendor won't sell you boots
RIP {{champion:69}}
i thought there is a mini-skirt, kinda cheer leader looking thing{{item:1033}} ? gives small magic resist and it makes into a clam shell {{item:1057}}  for more magic resist.
Null magic mantle is more like a cloak shoulderpeice thing. I think...
As Captain of said wear piece, I approve.
{{champion:110}}: What are pants?
baby don't kick me, don't kick me, no more

http://piandao.org/panshots/atla/ep49pan4.jpg

No fire lord Ozai, you are not wearing pants!
No...

> [{quoted}](name=TequilaZombie,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=fgEms6j3,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-12-19T11:14:15.900+0000)
>
> We currently have a lot of torso protection to help us get in the battle:
> {{item:3742}} {{item:1029}} {{item:1031}} {{item:3814}} {{item:3026}} {{item:1057}} {{item:1033}} {{item:3084}} {{item:2053}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3068}} {{item:3075}} {{item:3082}} {{item:3083}} 
> 
> Protection for our heads, some even being stylish as hell:
> {{item:3136}} {{item:3109}} {{item:3151}} {{item:3140}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3800}} {{item:3211}} {{item:3090}} 
> 
> Protection to our feet so we can run faster without worrying about stepping on a pointy stone:
> {{item:1001}} {{item:3117}} {{item:3009}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3158}} {{item:3111}} {{item:3047}} {{item:3020}} 
> 
> Protection for our hands so we don&#039;t hurt ourselves while punching our enemy&#039;s faces (they might be rock solid):
> {{item:1051}} {{item:3025}} {{item:3052}} {{item:3053}} {{item:3191}} {{item:3801}} 
> 
> Or if you don&#039;t like punching things, you can take up to 6 weapons AT ONCE! (Seriously, how that even works?)
> {{item:3003}} {{item:1038}} {{item:3144}} {{item:3153}} {{item:1026}} {{item:3133}} {{item:1083}} {{item:1042}} {{item:3812}} {{item:3137}} {{item:1055}} {{item:3147}} {{item:1416}} {{item:1418}} {{item:1419}} {{item:3508}} {{item:3123}} {{item:3092}} {{item:3098}} {{item:3022}} {{item:3034}} {{item:3184}} {{item:3124}} {{item:3155}} {{item:3030}} {{item:3146}} {{item:3145}} {{item:1041}} {{item:3031}} {{item:2015}} {{item:3035}} {{item:3100}} {{item:1036}} {{item:3036}} {{item:3104}} {{item:3004}} {{item:3156}} {{item:3139}} {{item:3170}} {{item:3033}} {{item:3042}} {{item:3115}} {{item:1058}} {{item:3044}} {{item:3046}} {{item:1037}} {{item:3252}} {{item:3094}} {{item:3074}} {{item:1043}} {{item:3027}} {{item:3085}} {{item:3116}} {{item:3181}} {{item:3040}} {{item:3134}} {{item:3057}} {{item:3303}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3101}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3599}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3077}} {{item:3748}} {{item:3078}} {{item:1053}} {{item:3135}} {{item:3122}} {{item:3091}} {{item:3142}} {{item:3086}} 
> 
> You can bring fashion acessories, if you feel like it:
> {{item:3301}} {{item:3102}} {{item:1004}} {{item:3190}} {{item:3107}} {{item:1082}} 
> 
> Gems ({{champion:44}}):
> {{item:3010}} {{item:3067}} {{item:1028}} {{item:1027}} 
> 
> Or some weird stuff that nobody really knows what they are or why you would bring it to a fight:
> {{item:3113}} {{item:3504}} {{item:3174}} {{item:3751}} {{item:2303}} {{item:2302}} {{item:2301}} {{item:3401}} {{item:3114}} {{item:3110}} {{item:3024}} {{item:3222}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3050}} {{item:3157}} 
> 
> Hell, you can even bring something to read if you&#039;re stuck in a farm lane!
> {{item:1052}} {{item:3108}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3802}} {{item:3165}} 
> 
> 
> But even with all those items, we have absolutely nothing to protect us from a swift kick to the groin?
> 
> 
> This is a serious balance issue and should be treated accordingly!

this is gonna be moved to gameplay I already called it
Hey, it's a pertinent balance issue. Male champions are suffering from extra squishiness to their squishy parts

Spandex of the Woodland Rangers (advanced starter item)

+200 health
+200% mana regen.
Unique Passive: Tight; +20 Out of Combat Movespeed.
Unique Passive: Manly; Ignore 12 dmg from auto attacks and abilities (25% effective against dots)

agreed, my breaches are cold!

also, isnt randuins a shield? I always thought it was a shield

I love you for two reasons:
1. I never realized we never had pants
2. And you have tequila in your summoner name

<3

1 tequila makes her clothes fall off. 

nuf said.

Upon reading the title, This ended up coming to mind for some weird reason.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eGQEAiZJMco)]
Who knows, maybe Ohmwrecker might get reworked into a pair of pants in the diver update.

**skinny jeans**

+30 magic resist
+80 edgyness 
-30% movement speed
Ever play d&d? Wizards can take scrolls & read them while dodging being hit. XD

Demacian Battle-Skirt

25 Armor
2.5% MS
Unique Passive: Och! - For 2.5 seconds after being basic attacked, you can move through minions.

Espeically with Camille now...male champs REALLY need crotch armour.
Except Yasuo.
His crotch can get sliced and diced.

Silky Skivvies
+250 HP
+10% Movespeed
+bronze skill
+fabulousness
-attractiveness to your waifu

Passive: "I'm just too fabulous for you": Immune to Charms and you can perpetually move through units.
Active: Tear through the rift with your skivvies, applying "its so smooth" to all enemy champions. Hitting a marked enemy will cause them to leave the game and rethink life.
{{champion:29}} He loves the easy breezey between his legs.
This post made my day. S+
I thought there were pants in the jungle this season. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

{{item:3174}} The legends say the chalice lies in the mountain of a thousand nights
And he who wields it will become crazy awesome
